body_html:
axis: An int, the axis that should be normalized (typically the features axis). For instance, after a Convolution2D layer with data_format="channels_first", set axis=1 in BatchNormalization.

so, you should choose the exact axis that you want to normalize.

Such as:
Z = [100, None]
B = tf.layers.batch_normalization(Z, axis = 0, training = is_training)

if you write "axis = -1", it will get wrong bug report.

body:
axis: An int, the axis that should be normalized (typically the features axis). For instance, after a Convolution2D layer with data_format="channels_first", set axis=1 in BatchNormalization.

so, you should choose the exact axis that you want to normalize.

Such as:
Z = [100, None]
B = tf.layers.batch_normalization(Z, **axis = 0**, training = is_training)

if you write "axis = -1", it will get wrong bug report.
